name: StationaryOxygenConcentratorTherapyDevice
title: Stationary Oxygen Concentrator Therapy Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Oxygen concentrator therapy devices for home use that are designed to remain in one place while operating.),(Data Element Scope: Stationary oxygen concentrator therapy devices accepted by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid as valid for home use.),(Inclusion Criteria: Oxygen concentrator therapy devices for home use that are designed to remain in one place while operating.),(Exclusion Criteria: Oxygen concentrator therapy devices designed to allow a change in location while operating.)

concept.display: Oxygen concentrator, single delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate
Oxygen concentrator, dual delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate, each

contains.display: Oxygen concentrator, single delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate
Oxygen concentrator, dual delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate, each
